<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Dragon's Gaze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Anstarren Des Drachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Regard fixe du Dragon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Olhar Do Dragon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo Sguardo fisso Del Drago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βλέμμα του δράκου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Mirada fija Del Dragón</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a fun hands on activity with instructions to build a dragon and to observe an illusion.This activity can be done at home.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Hände eines Spaßes auf Aktivität mit
Anweisungen, einen Drachen aufzubauen und eine illusion.This 
Aktivität zu beobachten kann zu Hause getan werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est des mains d'un amusement sur l'activité 
avec des instructions de construire un dragon et observer une 
activité d'illusion.This peut être fait à la maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é mãos de um divertimento na atividade com 
instruções para construir um dragon e observar uma atividade de 
illusion.This pode ser feito na HOME.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è mani di divertimento su attività con le 
istruzioni per costruire un drago ed osservare un'attività di 
illusion.This può essere fatta nel paese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια διασκέδαση δίνει στη δραστηριότητα με 
τις οδηγίες για να χτίσει έναν δράκο και για να παρατηρήσει μια 
παραίσθηση Αυτή η δραστηριότητα μπορεί να γίνει στο σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es manos de una diversión en actividad con 
instrucciones de construir un dragón y observar una actividad de 
illusion.This se puede hacer en el país.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">visão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
